mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Parmelee, David
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lieut. Charles Lewis on his way to Natchitiche died here 12th August; believes he is Jefferson's nephew ; description of territory; people are prejudiced against U.S.; believe Spain would have satisfied their claims; U.S. disposed to curtail rights of claimants; Mr. Thompson and self endeavor to remove prejudices.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1806 August 28, "Territory of Orleans, Western District," Opelousas, [Louisiana] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
